boardgame.name: RailRoad ink Arcade
Railroad Ink: Arcade Expansion Pack
Railroad Ink: Würfelerweiterung Arcade
boardgame.description:
In the multiplayer puzzle game Railroad Ink™, your goal is to connect as many exits on your board as possible. Each round, a set of dice are rolled in the middle of the table, determining which kind of road and railway routes are available to all players.

Use the 4 special dice of the Arcade Expansion Pack in addition to your regular Route dice, and find new ways to score points:


Pluck-Man (1 die): feed Pluck-Man with enough Fruits to eat those pesky Ghost!
Tetromino (1 die): respect your commitment for urban planning to gain precious points!
Galactic Invaders (1 die): send Aliens to attack your opponents while trying to defend against those invading you!
Rainbow (1 die): populate your board with colorful rainbows and send ominous clouds to your adversaries!


Note: at least one core set of Railroad Ink™ or Railroad Ink Challenge™ is required to use this expansion pack.

boardgame.name: Railroad Ink: Underground Expansion Pack
Railroad Ink: Underground – Dobbelspel
Railroad Ink: Würfelerweiterung U-Bahn
boardgame.description:
In the multiplayer puzzle game Railroad Ink™, your goal is to connect as many exits on your board as possible.
Each round, a set of dice are rolled in the middle of the table, determining which kind of road and railway routes are available to all players.

The Underground Expansion Pack contains 4 dice that you can use in two ways.

With the Standalone mode, you use them instead of the normal Route dice, to build underground networks of Subway Routes and Water Pipes to score points in a whole new way.

With the Expansion mode, you use them together with the normal Route dice, but without mixing them! You need two boards for each player, one for the Surface and one for the Underground. The basic Route dice are used on the Surface board (following the normal rules), while the Underground dice (and rules) are used on the Underground board!

Note: at least one core set of Railroad Ink™ or Railroad Ink Challenge™ is required to use this expansion pack.

boardgame.name: Blobs
boardgame.description:
Blobs is played on the lines and intersections of a 12x12 grid; players take it in turn to draw "blobs" encircling one to four adjacent intersections.

The board is initially seeded with two to four one-point blobs per player (depending on player count). After that a player places a new blob by drawing a "stem" along a grid line from one of their existing blobs, at the end of which a new blob is placed. The shorter the stem, the larger the new blob.

When no players can play the game ends. The blobs score based on their sizes and the player with the most points wins.

boardgame.description:
In the multiplayer puzzle game Railroad Ink™, your goal is to connect as many exits on your board as possible.
Each round, a set of dice are rolled in the middle of the table, determining which kind of road and railway routes are available to all players.

Use the 4 special dice of the Engineer Expansion Pack in addition to your regular Route dice, and find new ways to score points:

Renovation (1 die): modify pre-existing routes and add more connections to them!

Special (1 die): build Special Routes in a whole new way and score a lot of points!


Note: at least one core set of Railroad Ink™ or Railroad Ink Challenge™ is required to use this expansion pack.

Each round, a set of dice are rolled in the middle of the table, determining which kind of road and railway routes are available to all players.

boardgame.name: Railroad Ink: Electricity Expansion Pack
Railroad Ink: Energy – Dobbelspel
Railroad Ink: Würfelerweiterung Elektrizität
boardgame.description:
In the multiplayer puzzle game Railroad Ink™, your goal is to connect as many exits on your board as possible.
Each round, a set of dice are rolled in the middle of the table, determining which kind of road and railway routes are available to all players.

Use the 4 special dice of the Electricity Expansion Pack in addition to your regular Route dice, and find new ways to score points:


Street Lamp (2 dice): build Street Lamps and power them with Generators to light your board and score a lot of points!
Power Grid (2 dice): connect your Exits to the central Accumulator and charge it with electricity to multiply your bonus points!


Note: at least one core set of Railroad Ink™ or Railroad Ink Challenge™ is required to use this expansion pack.

boardgame.name: Crokey
boardgame.description:
Crokey is a board game version of croquet. The board is a grid with each square representing approximately nine square yards of space. There are holes into which metal hoops are inserted, and the hoops hold plastic clips to designate order.

There are three versions of the game in the rules: Sequence Crokey which is based on Golf Croquet, Crokey, which is based on Association Croquet, and Error Crokey which introduces a luck element.

The game was apparently self-published by the designer under the name "Tactical Games."

boardgame.name: Fugue In Void
boardgame.description:
A walking sim in which you can explore all kinds of mysterious places and dive into a world full of atmosphere. Let this experience unfold in your head. Let it inspire you.

Source: The Game Website.

boardgame.name: Ramses II
boardgame.description:
Ramses II is a variant based on Avalon Hill's tactical battle game Alexander the Great.
The mapboard, with a few modifications, and the game system are used in the variant. The vast majority of the rules for Alexander the Great are employed; those modified or not utilized are noted below. New game counters, which represent the Hittite and Egyptian forces, are provided on the insert of this issue. With these-mapboard,
rules, counters-at hand, one can recreate the bloody Battle of Kadesh, fought over 3200 years ago.

—description from the publisher

listing.notes:
A rare *original* "Ramses II" expansion for "Alexander The Great" to add "The Battle of Kadesh" in New/Mint condition. This is an ORIGINAL from Avalon Hill c1983 and comes with the entire original issue of their in-house magazine, in new/mint condition as well as historical background, designer notes and of course the terrain tiles and counters still on the card.
This is an incredibly rare expansion for this classic game and I have only this one copy of the original for sale at this time.
An extremely rare and fun expansion that takes the classic “Alexander The Great” designed by Gary Gygax (of Dungeons & Dragons fame) back to 1274 BC and drops you into The Battle of Kadesh for a fantastic, fast-paced chariot clash that made Rameses II into "Rameses The Great".
The Battle of Kadesh took place between the forces of the New Kingdom of Egypt under Rameses II and the Hittite Empire under Muwatalli II near the city of Kadesh on the Orontes River and the modern Lebanon - Syria border and signaled the beginning of the end for the great Hittite empire.
PLEASE NOTE: This is an *expansion* for Avalon Hill's "Alexander The Great" game and ownership of that game is required.
Please review pictures for the exact item you will receive.

boardgame.name: Rise of the Drow - Pawn Set
boardgame.description: This huge set contains over 200 pawns with full-color, beautifully depicted artwork of all the unique creatures & characters within Rise of the Drow: Collector’s Edition. Of course, the pawns can be used again and again for all your own adventures and campaigns. - Publisher Blurb

boardgame.name: shapez.io
boardgame.description:
User Summary

Build factories to create specific shapes and have them delivered where they need to go. As you deliver the shapes, new requirements open up for different shapes on an ever expanding map.

The game is inspired by Factorio and can be tried for free at shapez.io

boardgame.name: Head Cases
boardgame.description:
A party game about clever psychological deduction, and acting absurd. For each round one player is the Doctor, and all others are the Patients.

Each round, Patients draw two cards and choose one to act out, discarding the other.

Each Patient makes a short statement about their card (preferably in character) without saying any of the text written in red on the card.

The Doctor may ask each Patient two follow up questions, which they must answer (again preferably in character).

The Doctor then tries to diagnose the Patients. If they are correct, the Patient scores points equal to the number shown on the card by placing it face up in front of them. If they are wrong, the Doctor loses 1 point which is shown by placing the card face down in front of the Doctor.

After all players have been the Doctor once, the player with the highest score wins.

-description from designer

boardgame.name: Bleach: Brave Souls
boardgame.description: The world of mega-hit manga and anime Bleach comes to Steam in this exciting 3D action game! Build a team using your favorite characters from the Bleach universe!

boardgame.name: Rollercoaster Tycoon 3: Complete Edition
boardgame.description:
GET TO THE TOP - BUT DON'T LOOK DOWN!

Build the park of a lifetime and rediscover the critically acclaimed rollercoaster simulation bestseller. Feel the thrill of a genre-defining classic, complete with two huge expansion packs.

Source: The Game Website.

boardgame.name: Usagi-Chan de Cue!!
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Welcome to Japan, Jumper! Yep, you will arrive at what looks to simply be modern day Japan around the early 2000s. But under the surface, some really weird happenings have been going on.

At the center of those events lay the coming of “Merged Beings”: particularly lonely people fused with animals they shared something in common with, granting them strange powers. This development earned the attention of the Japanese government, who created a special branch to clean up this little problem.

The Public Welfare Department, in spite of its harmless-sounding name, exists for the purpose of uniting the district of Japan to make them less independent along with capturing Merged Beings to experiment and/or dispose of them. All for the sake of making a normal world.

Our story properly begins in the local high school of the autonomous district Banzai City, where the infamous delinquent Inaba Mikami ends up merging with a school bunny named Makima. You arrive the morning just after this incident.

boardgame.name: Seraph of the End
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

On the 25th December 2012, the world came to an end. A mysterious virus spread throughout the world, killing all full humans above the age of 13 and, not long after, the endless hordes of the Horsemen of the Apocalypse first emerged, terrible monsters that seemingly have no desires other than killing all humans they come across. Those children who survived amidst the chaos soon came into contact with the vampires, who, emerging from their hidden cities deep below the surface, enslaved the survivors for use as little more than livestock. Seeing as even the weakest vampire is many times stronger than the best of humans, it wasn’t long before most of the surface world was under their control.

boardgame.name: Skylanders Trap Team
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Greetings, Portal Master! I am Eon, and I have come to guide you on a great journey. Welcome to Skylands: a magical world of wonder and adventure, protected by the greatest heroes ever known – the Skylanders. But Skylands wasn’t always so peaceful; once it was held in the vicious grip of the most notorious evil-doers Skylands has ever known – the Doom Raiders. Striking from their hideout, deep in the savage Badlands, the Doom Raiders plundered without mercy, until no place was safe. Fortunately, an elite team of Skylanders, wielding legendary weapons, was called upon to track down these villains, and bring them to justice. They were the Trap Team. Once captured, the Doom Raiders were taken to the most impenetrable fortress ever constructed: Cloudcracker Prison. Locked away behind walls of pure Traptanium, the Doom Raiders would never again threaten Skylands. Or so it seemed for many years, until a familiar evil returned. The Trap Team was hurled far away from Skylands, and as they were drawn away from its magic, they began to shrink. Meanwhile, the shattered fragments of Cloudcracker Prison transformed into powerful Traps. But now you have found them, and just in time. Skylands’ most infamous evil-doers are on the loose again. It is up to you, and your Skylanders, to track them down before it is too late. A great adventure awaits you, Portal Master. Behold!


- Master Eon explains the origins of the Trap Team to the Portal Master

boardgame.name: Tabletop Gaming (Issue 47 - Oct 2020)
boardgame.description:
Tabletop Gaming
October 2020

20 Years of Carcassonne

boardgame.name: Mythologien in der Welt
boardgame.description:
In Mythologien in der Welt ("Mythologies of the World"), you pay tributes to collect various gods from Greek, Norse, and other mythos.

There's a knack to paying tribute successfully, but you also have to keep an eye on what your rival tribute payers are doing. Try to come out on top of the competing offers and collect as many gods as you can!
boardgame.boardgamepublisher: Studium Mundi (スタジオムンディ)

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes:
Spieleranzahl: 2 bis 5 Spieldauer: 15 Minuten Altersempfehlung: 8+
MYTHOLOGIEN IN DER WELT - Partyspiel Mythologien in der Welt ist ein Spiel, bei dem man Götter aus griechischen, nordischen und anderen Mythologien sammelt, indem man Opfer darbietet. Behalte deine Gegner im Auge, während du deine Opfer strategisch geschickt einsetzt, um so viele Gottheiten wie möglich zu sammeln.
* Einfache Regeln * Hohes Suchtpotential * Die Mythen der Welt als frisches Spiethema * Ein Partyspiel, das leicht von mehreren Personen gespielt werden kann!
Inhalt: 50 Mythologie-Karten (5 Mythologien, je 10 Karten) 35 Opferaltare (5 Farben, je 7 Karten) 1 Spielanleitung
https://youtu.be/cBap-iE9DB0
Mit Spielregeln in folgenden Sprachen: DE, EN, FR

boardgame.name: Oh! My Fish Head
boardgame.description:
You are a talented Fisherman. Do your best to get more fish and Bonus Catch including precious treasure or Rainbonus Fish. Try to connect more Fish Cards within the limit time and utilize gene mutation fish to get more chance to win！

How to play:

In your turn, draw 1 Fish Card and place it under any front row Bobber. If you place the card as the 3rd position under a Bobber Token, you will get the Bobber Token and all Fish Cards under the Bobber.

You have to place all Fish Cards that you got this round into your Fishing Rod Area. (Each player owns 3 Fishing Rod Areas) You can‛t keep them for next round. Each Fishing Rod Area can only place the cards with same color.

If you get a Fish Card that you can‛t connect, you can break your Fishing Rod during connecting your fish. Turn the Fishing Tackle Tokens of this area to Scoop Net side. The player who get Scoop Net can draw Bonus Catch from Bonus Catch Sack.

If you complete a fish, it means the fish is on the hook now! Face them up in Complete Fish Zone. These Fish Cards will be
counted as points in the end of the game.

When the game reaches the 7th round and all players complete Catch Action, the game ends. Each Fish Card get 1 point. Check the "longest" fish for each color and give Trophy Card to the onwer. If you get Trophy Card of one color, each Fish Card of that color will get 2 points.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Do or Drink
boardgame.description:
Do or DRINK is your new favorite party game. This game brings strangers closer together, has the potential to break up year long friendships and has even played a hand in getting a few people pregnant. If you are looking for a game that will make you laugh so hard you cry and show a side of you you didn’t know was there, look no further. Best part is you probably won’t remember what happened the next day.

—description from the publisher

The game play is simple. Separate the white and black cards into two piles and shuffle. The first player draws a white card, reads it aloud, does what it says, then the next player does the same until someone picks up a white "DRAW" card. Once this happens then that player must draw a black from the other pile, read it aloud, and do what it says or drink. If the challenge on the card is completed successfully, the card can be kept by the player and counted as points. Some cards are far more challenging than others and therefore are worth more but also have greater consequences for failing to successfully perform the challenge. In the end, the player with the most points wins.

—description from the back of the box

listing.notes: Game is in very good condition and has been verified as complete including original instructions. All cards are in very good shape. Box has a little storage wear but overall the box is in good condition.

boardgame.name: Goblin Sword
boardgame.description:
Embark on an epic quest to retrieve the legendary sword
Goblin Sword is a retro-inspired action platformer with light rpg elements.

An army of monsters led by an evil wizard have invaded your hometown. Slay as many monsters as you can, collect loot, avoid dangerous traps and defeat menacing bosses, before facing the evil wizard himself.

Features:
-89 levels
-13 bosses
-30 weapons with unique special attacks
-30 relics that grant you abilities
-14 costumes
-8 guardians that follow you around and assist you
-5 secret very hard levels
-Decorate your home with souvenirs

(from Nintendo.com website)

boardgame.name: Day of Independence
boardgame.description:
A competitive semi-anti-co-operative board game of world domination. Warring human faction must choose to keep fighting one another or join forces to defeat the Alien invaders... or both... or side with the aliens to get help in defeating their human foes... or not.

Day of Independence is a grand strategy game for 2 - 5 players set in an alternative steam-punky future. Each player plays a human power trying to take over the world. At some random point in the game Aliens may show up. The Aliens' true intentions are slowly revealed over time, and players must decide whether to fight the Aliens or not. Players choose actions that will make them either Collaborators with the Aliens or Resistance Fighters. The benefits and penalties of each decision depends upon the Aliens' true intentions. Lots of strategy, forced cooperation, and the ever present possibility of a knife in the back makes this game fun and different each time it is played.

You live on an Earth that is a fractured world of rival human powers, struggling against each other for dominance… you know, the usual — like it’s always been. Each unwilling to let other nations just chill.
Culture, art, religion, language, population, and even military might have been reduced to a single quantified unit of influential power, called Influence.
Advances in technology have allowed all economies and industries to rely on just three resources: Ever-Stones, a chewy red resource crystal especially good in stews and as a sealant for nuclear waste sites; Green Avoidium, an aromatic mineral green resource used to put off chores and unpleasant tasks until tomorrow, and; Un-salt, a yellow resource ore best described by what it isn’t — it’s not salt.
Scientist the world over have postulated the possibility of extra-terrestrial life for centuries, but there has never been any proof that Aliens exist and no proof that they are heading to earth on a mothership filled with super-powerful weapons and a willingness to use them.
So don’t worry. There probably aren’t any super advanced Aliens out there with incredible technology that could pose a threat to humankind. Just keep fighting amongst yourselves. If only you could capture enough territory to declare yourself Ruler of Earth, everything would be great. All problems would be solved and you could go to bed at night and sleep the sleep of the just, knowing that you are the winner, ‘cause winning is all that matters.
But, if Aliens came… they might Exterminate the human race, or maybe they would come to Enslave you all. If they knew the Earth contained the Resource of Interest that they have been scouring the Universe for, they might come to Mine the Earth dry. Or maybe they might just come to say ‘hi’, as part of their mission to Explore strange new worlds and seek out new life and new civilizations. Or maybe capitalism would be their bag, and they would come to Trade, with a special offer, just for you.
But they probably don’t exist, so just keep fighting amongst yourselves.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Flight of the Centaurs
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

A corrupted centaur has been sighted near the reclusive village of Jarko’tu’ta. Having traded with a Cormanthor centaur tribe, the villagers are concerned that something terrible has happened to them. Is there still time to save the centaurs or is it already too late?!

A 2- to 4-Hour adventure for 1st-4th Level Characters.

boardgame.name: House of Silent Tides
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Welcome to an adventure in the Spies Below the Moonsea series of Underdark adventures! This adventure can be played as entirely stand-alone.

Elsewhere, an ambitious merchant sets upon the deadly task of establishing a trade route to nothing less than an Underdark city. His journey is destined to take him across the subterranean Moondeep Sea aboard a drow ship.

Where the two seas meet, secrets hide and adventure begins.

A Two- to Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8.

boardgame.name: House of Blades
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Welcome to an adventure in the Spies Below the Moonsea series of Underdark adventures! This adventure can be played as entirely stand-alone.

Zim Von Zeam – of ZVZ Caravans – has spent his life braving the lawless lands of Thar with his caravans. Now, life has gifted him with a new opportunity – establishing a trade route from Melvaunt to nothing less than an Underdark city. Does he have what it takes to deal with the treacherous drow? Zim’s ambition is an adventuring opportunity like no other.

Can you prove yourselves worthy in a test of combat prowess against elite drow troops and their cunning commander?

A Two- to Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8.

boardgame.name: Cozmic Metal Heads
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Robots! Big and small, with laser eyes and self-destruct modules, herein you'll find 48 pages featuring 36 robot backgrounds for your Troika! RPG romping.

Unit 10: You were the only unit to survive the battle, but not without a busted CPU.

Seventh Son: Seven were the slayers, seven were the ones that fell to the betrayers.

Hollow: You are cold and hollow now that you've left the warmth of Chamber 29.

Reclaimer 1-C: Unless somebody is actually using it, it's fair game.

Spider-Bot: Six legs and some bones. Why six legs?

This project started as as series of robot drawings and is fully illustrated in vivid cozmic Technicolor™.

boardgame.name: Phasmophobia
boardgame.description:
User Summary






UNRELEASED GAME – AVAILABLE




This game is still in active development and available to the public for purchase in it's unfinished state, either in Early-Alpha or Beta (or any status in between).




Phasmophobia is a cooperative horror game for 1-4 players. Play as a group of paranormal investigators sent to gather information ahead of a ghost removal crew. Use tools like an EMF indicator, a laser thermometer, and of course your trusty flashlight to track down the ghost and determine what kind of specter it is.
boardgame.videogamehonor: 2020 Global Game Awards Best Horror Game of the Year Winner
2020 Steam Awards Best VR Game of the Year Nominee
2020 The Game Awards Best Debut Game of the Year Winner
2021 Game Developers Choice Awards Best New IP of the Year Winner
2021 Game Developers Choice Awards Best VR/AR Game of the Year Nominee

boardgame.name: Unicorn Fever: Royal Hooves
boardgame.description:
More Unicorns, more fun! This expansion for Unicorn Fever contains 3 additional Unicorn Miniatures and cards, to expand the roster of unicorns available during your races and spice up your games with exciting new Fever abilities!

—description from the publisher

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet

Brand new copy of the game, in shrink wrap.
Shipping to EU would be 10 euro and the package should arrive in 7-10 days. Elsewhere – please ask!

Title: Unicorn Fever: Royal Hooves Publisher: Horrible Guild Language(s): English German French Spanish Italian

boardgame.name: Verschwörung von Andion
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb

Star bearers are the elves who wore the star-shaped mark on their shoulders, which made them the chosen ones for higher tasks. According to legend, they once directed the fate of the fenvar, the high elves, until the armies of the dhaza, the nameless Unlight, put an end to their empire.

In the plains of the north, where rough wind and rain lash across the land, the heroes follow the traces of its builder Amalaia with their newly recovered and restored artifact, the flying ship Bahalyr. But why do all the traces suggest that the once so hopeful elf returned from the north embittered and disillusioned? And what powers in the North are behind the fact that her soul song is blowing away in disharmonic fragments? The heroes will have to face this danger in order to further fathom the fate of the star-bearer.

With this addition to the second adventure of the Star Bearer campaign, you can add further facets to one of the stations on the journey of the Bahalyr and let your hero take a glimpse at elements of the campaign that will play an important role later in the story.


Klappentext

Sternenträger, das sind jene Elfen, die das sternförmige Mal auf ihrer Schulter trugen, welches sie zu Auserwählten für höhere Aufgaben bestimmte. Einst lenkten sie den Legenden nach die Geschicke der fenvar, der Hochelfen, bis die Armeen des dhaza, des namenlosen Unlichts, ihrem Reich ein Ende machten.

In den Ebenen des Nordens, wo rauer Wind und Regen über das Land peitschen, folgen die Helden mit ihrem neu geborgenen und restaurierten Artefakt, dem Flugschiff Bahalyr, den Spuren von dessen Erbauerin Amalaia. Doch weshalb deuten alle Spuren darauf hin, dass die einst so hoffnungsvolle Elfe damals verbittert und desillusioniert aus dem Norden zurückkehrte? Und welche Mächte im Norden stecken dahinter, dass ihr Seelenlied in disharmonischen Bruchstücken verweht? Die Helden werden sich dieser Gefahr stellen müssen, um das Schicksal der Sternenträgerin weiter ergründen zu können.

Mit dieser Ergänzung zum zweiten Abenteuer der Sternenträger-Kampagne kannst du eine der Stationen auf der Reise der Bahalyr um weitere Facetten bereichern und deinen Helden einen kleinen Ausblick auf Elemente der Kampagne werfen lassen, die im späteren Verlauf der Geschichte noch eine wichtige Rolle spielen werden.

boardgame.name: Am Heiligtum der Alten Götter
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb

Star bearers are the elves who wore the star-shaped mark on their shoulders, which made them the chosen ones for higher tasks. According to legend, they once directed the fate of the fenvar, the high elves, until the armies of the dhaza, the nameless Unlight, put an end to their empire.

With this addition to the second adventure of the Star Bearer campaign, you can add another episode to the journey of the Bahalyr between parts II and III of the campaign and let your hero take a glimpse of a snippet of the story of the Sky Storm.

Mit dieser Ergänzung zum zweiten Abenteuer der Sternenträger-Kampagne kannst du die Reise der Bahalyr zwischen Teil II und III der Kampagne um eine weitere Episode erweitern und deinen Helden einen kleinen Ausblick auf einen Ausschnitt der Geschichte des Himmelsturms werfen lassen.

boardgame.name: Das Grab im Eis
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb

Star bearers are the elves who wore the star-shaped mark on their shoulders, which made them the chosen ones for higher tasks. According to legend, they once directed the fate of the fenvar, the high elves, until the armies of the dhaza, the nameless Unlight, put an end to their empire.
In the plains of the north, where rough wind and rain lash across the land, the heroes follow the traces of its builder Amalaia with their newly recovered and restored artifact, the flying ship Bahalyr. But why do all the traces suggest that the once so hopeful elf returned from the north embittered and disillusioned? in order to further explore the fate of the star bearer.

Einst lenkten sie den Legenden nach die Geschicke der fenvar, der Hochelfen, bis die Armeen des dhaza, des namenlosen Unlichts, ihrem Reich ein Ende machten.
In den Ebenen des Nordens, wo rauer Wind und Regen über das Land peitschen, folgen die Helden mit ihrem neu geborgenen und restaurierten Artefakt, dem Flugschiff Bahalyr, den Spuren von dessen Erbauerin Amalaia. Und welche Mächte im Norden stecken dahinter, dass ihr Seelenlied in disharmonischen Bruchstücken verweht? Die Helden werden sich dieser Gefahr
stellen müssen, um das Schicksal der Sternenträgerin weiter ergründen zu können.
Mit dieser Ergänzung zum zweiten Abenteuer der Sternenträger-Kampagne kannst du die Reise der Bahalyr zwischen Teil II und III der Kampagne um eine weitere Episode erweitern und einen Handlungsstrang aus dem Abenteuer Klingen der Nacht aufgreifen.

boardgame.name: In the Zoo (fan expansion for Dizzle)
boardgame.description:
The story of "in the zoo":
You have to collect tickets at the entrance. Then it's off to the various enclosures where you can collect food from the animals.
The penguins only have cheap fish, for which you can collect a lot of points with the blue area. The elephant is really difficult at the beginning, but there is expensive salad and the girl is more valuable than the visitor children in the other enclosures.
And what is the most disturbing thing in the zoo? Rubbish! So there are -5 points for it.

boardgame.name: 3 Little Pigs
boardgame.description:
The first cooperative game for toddlers. The three little pigs have to go home before the wolf.

Three little pigs is a simple game from 2 years old and which takes around 10 minutes to play. It is ideal to start learning the rules.

The board represent three paths to pig's house plus another for the wolf. Players roll a dice each turn which have a different color in each side.

Yellow, red and blue allow one of the pigs to move to the next square if it match the color. White allows the player to move a pig of his choice. Black implies to move the wolf closer to the house and the flower allows the player to take one of the flower tiles that could lead to the three pigs moving one square each closer to the house or a movement for the wolf.

The players win if the three pigs reach the house before the wolf does. They lose if the wolf arrives before.

—user summary

boardgame.name: Das Wispernde Herz
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb

You wander through the damp meadows, excitement is spreading inside you. It is unusual for a young servant of the Raven to be given the leadership of a temple, even though it is a small house of worship with a tiny congregation and you will be the only consecrated one there. Yet you are looking forward to the challenge and longing to serve your Lord. Rabenbrück may be a remote place, separated from the fog bog only by a bridge, but the temple is almost 500 years old and it fills you with pride to be responsible for it and the people in your new home.

People may tell many horror stories about the Fog Bog, the monsters, witches and scoundrels that dwell within it, wisps of light that lure travelers to the treacherous mud pits, the fog itself that makes it difficult for the traveler to find his way, and the race of men that defies all these dangers. But what should be frightening to a woman who has dedicated herself to the god of death?

The Whispering Heart is a solo adventure that allows you to venture directly into the adventure without a master or fellow players. You play a Boron Consecrated One, and as you read, you will encounter new challenges section by section. All your skills will be needed to get away with a clean slate.

You do not need any previous knowledge. A ready-to-play Boron Consecrated One with whom you can embark on this adventure is included at the end of the book, and all rules and game mechanics are explained directly in the book.

Off you go on your adventure!

A solo adventure for a Boron-fearing heroine
Genre: Ghost story
Requirements: Research, thinking along, mystical exploration
Place: Rabenbrück at the Nebelmoor
Time: Boron 1040 BF

complexity (player/master): low / -
Experience of the hero: competent (with own hero)

requirements:
Social talents 2/4
Knowledge talents 1/4
Natural talents 1/4
Living history 1/4


Klappentext

Du wanderst durch die feuchten Auen, Aufregung macht sich in dir breit. Es ist ungewöhnlich, dass einer jungen Dienerin des Raben die Leitung eines Tempels übertragen wird, auch wenn es ein kleines Gotteshaus mit einer winzigen Gemeinde ist und du dort die einzige Geweihte sein wirst. Dennoch freust du dich auf die Herausforderung und sehnst dich danach, deinem Herrn dienen zu können. Rabenbrück mag ein abgelegener Ort sein, der vom Nebelmoor nur durch eine Brücke getrennt sein soll, aber der Tempelbau ist fast 500 Jahre alt und es erfüllt dich mit Stolz, für ihn und die Menschen in deiner neuen Heimat verantwortlich zu sein.

Die Menschen mögen sich viele Schauergeschichten über das Nebelmoor erzählen, die Monster, Hexen und Halunken, die in ihm hausen, Irrlichter, welche Reisende in die tückischen Schlammgruben locken, den Nebel selbst, der dem Wanderer die Orientierung raubt, und über den Menschenschlag, der all diesen Gefahren trotzt. Aber was sollte eine Frau schon ängstigen, die sich dem Gott des Todes verschrieben hat?

Das wispernde Herz ist ein Solo-Abenteuer, mit dem du dich ohne Meister und Mitspieler direkt ins Abenteuer wagen kannst. Du spielst eine Borongeweihte und begegnest beim Lesen Abschnitt für Abschnitt neuen Herausforderungen. All deine Fähigkeiten werden gefragt sein, um mit heiler Haut davonzukommen.

Du benötigst keinerlei Vorkenntnisse. Eine spielfertige Borongeweihte, mit der du dieses Abenteuer bestreiten kannst, ist am Ende des Bandes enthalten, und alle Regeln und Spielmechanismen werden direkt im Buch erklärt.

Auf ins Abenteuer!

Ein Solo-Abenteuer für eine boronfürchtige Heldin
Genre: Geistergeschichte
Voraussetzungen: Recherche, Mitdenken, Mystisches Erkunden
Ort: Rabenbrück am Nebelmoor
Zeit: Boron 1040 BF

Komplexität (Spieler/Meister): gering / -
Erfahrung des Helden: kompetent (bei eigenem Helden)

Anforderungen:
Gesellschaftstalente 2/4
Wissenstalente 1/4
Naturtalente 1/4
Lebendige Geschichte 1/4

boardgame.name: Das Heldenbrevier der Dampfenden Dschungel
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb

Once again, the Horasian scholar Yalsinia ya Tarcallo, ethnologist and director of the Aves School of the University of Methumis, is going on a journey to the Deep South. This time, her research will focus on the rumors of the emergence of new death cults among the tribes of the forest people and utulus that populate the steaming jungles. Rarely, however, do her expeditions go as planned, and so she is fortunate to make the acquaintance of the young Nepi-Luhan of the Napewanha tribe, who is on his own mission ...


Klappentext

Einmal mehr begibt sich die horasische Gelehrte Yalsinia ya Tarcallo, ihres Zeichens Völkerkundlerin und Leiterin der Aves-Schule der Universität von Methumis, auf eine Reise in den Tiefen Süden. Ihr Forschungsbestreben gilt diesmal den Gerüchten vom Aufkommen neuartiger Todeskulte unter den Stämmen der Waldmenschen und Utulus, welche die Dampfenden Dschungel bevölkern. Selten jedoch verlaufen ihre Expeditionen wie geplant, und so schätzt sie sich glücklich, die Bekanntschaft des jungen Nepi-Luhan vom Stamm der Napewanha zu machen, der sich auf seiner ganzen eigenen Mission befindet ...

boardgame.name: Rüstkammer der Dampfenden Dschungel
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb

On the mist-covered ridges of the rain mountains, on the pearly white beaches of the forest islands and in the impenetrable rain forest in between, the tribal cultures of the forest people and utulus have existed for thousands of years and watch over the dangerous mysteries of the steaming jungles.

Other cultures often smile at the craftsmanship of the inhabitants of the rainforests of the Deep South. But hardly any other group of people knows how to use what nature has to offer in an optimal way. Who else but the tribes of the rainforest mountains knows of wills knotted from elastic lianas? Effective diving spears and harpoons are used on the rivers and coasts of South-Aventuria. The warriors of many a tribe are feared for their arts with the blowpipe, with which they can drive poison-soaked arrows into the flesh of their enemies. But even a midland explorer is well advised not to set off into the merciless jungles of the south without the right equipment - a reliable machete and an explorer's whip are certainly indispensable! The armoury of the Steaming Jungle contains an almost inexhaustible fund of the most diverse items to defy the dangers of the rainforests. And, of course, there is no shortage of diverse armour, which the resourceful inhabitants of the jungle also make from rather unusual materials.

As if that weren't enough, this volume also offers background information on equipment made of shimmering blue Epharite, a metallic material that has increasingly puzzled the alchemists of the South in recent times. Finally, it also contains a detailed treatise on the complex practices of bartering, which determines the mercantile relationships of the jungle tribes among themselves, but often also with outsiders.

This volume complements the Regional Game Aid The Steaming Jungle with extensive and generally applicable rules for the special items of the region. Knowledge of the rules and the Aventurian Almanac is assumed.


Klappentext

Auf den nebelumflossenen Graten des Regengebirges, an den perlweißen Stränden der Waldinseln und im undurchdringlichen Regenwald dazwischen existieren seit Jahrtausenden die Stammeskulturen der Waldmenschen und Utulus und wachen über die gefährlichen Mysterien der Dampfenden Dschungel.

Von anderen Kulturen wird die Handwerkskunst der Bewohner der Regenwälder des Tiefen Südens nicht selten belächelt. Dabei versteht sich kaum ein Menschenschlag so sehr darauf, auf optimale Weise das zu nutzen, was die Natur zu bieten hat. Wer sonst außer den Stämmen des Regengebirges kennt aus elastischen Lianen geknüpfte Zwillen? An den Flüssen und Küsten Südaventuriens kommen effektive Tauchspeere und Harpunen zum Einsatz. Die Krieger so manches Stammes sind für ihre Künste mit dem Blasrohr gefürchtet, mit dem sie gifttriefende Pfeile ins Fleisch ihrer Feinde treiben können. Doch auch ein mittelländischer Entdecker ist wohl beraten, sich nicht ohne die passende Ausrüstung in die unbarmherzigen Urwälder des Südens aufzumachen – unverzichtbar sind sicher die verlässliche Machete und eine Entdeckerpeitsche! Die Rüstkammer der Dampfenden Dschungel enthält einen schier unerschöpflichen Fundus unterschiedlichster Gegenstände, um den Gefahren der Regenwälder zu trotzen. Und natürlich fehlt auch nicht diverses Rüstzeug, das die findigen Bewohner des Dschungels auch aus eher ungewöhnlichen Materialien fertigen.

Dem nicht genug, bietet dieser Band auch Hintergründe zu Ausrüstung aus dem blauschimmerndem Epharit, einem metallischen Werkstoff, der den Alchimisten des Südens in jüngerer Vergangenheit vermehrt Rätsel aufgibt. Abschließend ist auch eine ausführliche Abhandlung über die komplexen Gepflogenheiten des Tauschhandels enthalten, welche die merkantilen Beziehungen der Dschungelstämme untereinander, aber oft auch mit Außenstehenden bestimmt.

Dieser Band ergänzt die Regionalspielhilfe Die Dampfenden Dschungel mit umfangreichen und allgemeingültigen Regeln für die besonderen Gegenstände der Region. Kenntnisse des Regelwerks sowie des Aventurischen Almanachs werden vorausgesetzt.

boardgame.name: Die dampfenden Dschungel - Der Tiefe Süden & die Waldinseln
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb

On the mist-covered ridges of the rain mountains, on the pearly white beaches of the forest islands and in the impenetrable rain forest in between, the tribal cultures of the forest people and utulus have existed for thousands of years and watch over the dangerous mysteries of the steaming jungles.

With this regional game aid, you will receive additional background material on the Steaming Jungle, the barely explored wilderness of the Deep South, from the fragrant forests under the wind Horoban in the West, beyond the impassable highlands of H'Rabaal, to the pirate island of Altoum, which lives up to its name, and the distant and exotic islets of the Pearl Islands. As a starting point for an expedition into the rainforests of Meridiana, Hôt-Alem, the City of the Sun, the last major port of the south under Middle Kingdom control, is a good place to start. However, only those who get involved in the very own culture of the tribes of forest people and utulus can get closer to the great secrets of the steaming jungles, possibly even the lost legendary refuge Kuruke-Wape.

Eleven professions appropriate to the region are presented, including the headstrong parrot witch of the Napewanha, the hopeful Utulu shaman of the sun god Obaran, and the lizard warrior of the Yakosh-Dey, who fights for an end to slavery.

Also included:

- a freely locatable typical village of forest people and utulus,
- a particularly extensive regional bestiary and herbarium,
- a detailed explanation of animism and shamanism, which determine the world view of the meridian tribal cultures
- new weapons and armor, including the reliable explorer whip, the shamanic bone club, and the fearsome chitin armor of the Keke-Wanaq,
- Focus rules on traits that give your heroes a flair typical of the region as well as a table to inspire or dice out your hero background,
- new special skills, spells, rituals, liturgies and ceremonies,
- a big chapter with mysteries and adventure hangers especially for the game master,
- and enclosed maps of the region (3xA3) plus in the book city maps of Hôt-Alem, Tapam-Waba as well as two cities in the rain mountains, which probably only true adventurers will ever reach!


Klappentext

Auf den nebelumflossenen Graten des Regengebirges, an den perlweißen Stränden der Waldinseln und im undurchdringlichen Regenwald dazwischen existieren seit Jahrtausenden die Stammeskulturen der Waldmenschen und Utulus und wachen über die gefährlichen Mysterien der Dampfenden Dschungel.

Mit dieser Regionalspielhilfe erhältst du ergänzendes Hintergrundmaterial zu den Dampfenden Dschungeln, der kaum erforschten Wildnis des Tiefen Südens, von den duftenden Wäldern unter dem Wind Horoban im Westen, jenseits des unwegsamen Hochlandes von H’Rabaal, über die Pirateninsel Altoum, die ihrem Namen alle Ehre macht, bis hin zu den fernen und exotischen Eilanden der Perleninseln. Als Ausgangspunkt für eine Expedition in die Regenwälder Meridianas eignet sich Hôt-Alem, die Sonnenstadt, der letzte große Hafen des Südens unter mittelreichischer Kontrolle. Doch nur wer sich auf die ganz eigene Kultur der Stämme von Waldmenschen und Utulus einlässt, kann den großen Geheimnissen der Dampfenden Dschungel näher kommen, möglicherweise gar der verschollenen sagenhaften Zuflucht Kuruke-Wape.

Elf zur Region passende Professionen werden vorgestellt, darunter die eigensinnige Papageienhexe der Napewanha, der hoffnungsvolle Utulu-Schamane des Sonnengottes Obaran und die Eidechsenkriegerin der Yakosh-Dey, die für ein Ende der Sklaverei kämpft.

Weiterhin sind enthalten:

- ein frei verortbares typisches Dorf der Waldmenschen und Utulus,
- ein besonders umfangreiches regionales Bestiarium und Herbarium,
- eine ausführliche Erläuterung von Animismus und Schamanismus, welche das Weltbild der meridianischen Stammeskulturen bestimmen,
- neue Waffen und Rüstungen, darunter die verlässliche Entdeckerpeitsche, die schamanische Knochenkeule und die furchteinflößende Chitinrüstung der Keke-Wanaq,
- Fokusregeln zu Wesenszügen, die deinen Helden regionstypisches Flair verleihen sowie eine Tabelle zur Inspiration oder zum Auswürfeln deines Heldenhintergrundes,
- neue Sonderfertigkeiten, Zauber, Rituale, Liturgien und Zeremonien,
- ein großes Kapitel mit Mysterien und Abenteueraufhängern speziell für den Spielleiter,
- und beiliegende Karten der Region (3xA3) plus im Buch Stadtpläne von Hôt-Alem, Tapam-Waba sowie zwei Städten im Regengebirge, die wohl nur wahre Abenteurer je erreichen werden!

boardgame.name: My Life Be Like
boardgame.description:
The players showdown their draw in the same time. Highest point player could take the Life Goal Card first. 6 type of Life Goals include: Love, Family, Wealth, Profession, Hobbies, and Friendship.

There are 12 Characters based on Horoscopes. Must fully understand your Horoscope power and weakness to change your playing strategy.

You keep the Goal Card on your table.They will score differently with your Horoscope ability after the game ends.

There will be one Privilege character always take the best Goal card automatically, and will run the score far away from the rest of players. When the Privilege reach 88 point on the score map. The game ends.

But Player still have chances to win, if you know how to live your life and lucky enough.

Life has its up and downs. Beware of the Privilege and other competitors. Its okay to be not okay in one round. Just take back on the next round.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Jadegrün und Kobaltblau
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb

For thousands of years, the tribes of the forest people in the depths of southern Aventuria have watched over ancient taboos, remote places where sometimes terrible threats have been averted. One of these places is located in the highlands of H'Rabaal, where the masses of glaciers under the mountain Kara'iriְ'itir keep a long forgotten danger at bay. Since the fall of the stars, however, many of these zones of banishment are slowly disappearing, and only when the widely scattered tribes of the steaming jungles stand united against them, many a catastrophe may be averted after all.

The expeditions of the Horasian ethnologist Yalsinia ya Tarcallo, head of the recently founded Aves School of the Duke Eolan University of Methumis, bring her ever closer to the mystery of ancient prophecies that foresaw the impending danger and gave the forest people's shamans the means to confront it. But dark forces are trying to thwart the shamans' plan, and the cunning Al'anfan explorer Notia Botero-Montez, who does not shy away from ordinary theft to further her own research, is harmless in comparison.

Daring explorers are called upon to solve the mystery of the jade statuette, which was stolen from the possession of the Horasian scholars. It is necessary to follow the traces of a long forgotten culture. From the sunny city of Hôt-Alem, the heroes must travel to the island of Altoum and approach the forest tribes living there, they must cross the impassable jungles on the banks of the river Jalob and ascend to the highlands of H'Rabaal - and in the end even venture into the unexplored depths beneath the rainforest mountains. In the process, they may succeed in unlocking one of the best-kept secrets of the Steaming Jungle: the legendary city of Kuruke-Wape, which was lost thousands of years ago.


Klappentext

Seit Jahrtausenden wachen die Stämme der Waldmenschen im Tiefen Süden Aventuriens über uralte Tabus, entlegene Orte, an denen teils furchtbare Bedrohungen gebannt sind. Einer dieser Orte befindet sich im Hochland von H’Rabaal, wo die Gletschermassen unter dem Berg Kara’iriְ’itir eine längst vergessene Gefahr in Schach halten. Seit dem Sternenfall aber schwindet so manche dieser Bannzonen langsam dahin, und nur wenn sich die weit verstreut lebenden Stämme der Dampfenden Dschungel vereint dagegenstellen, mag so manche Katastrophe doch noch abgewendet werden.

Die Expeditionen der horasischen Völkerkundlerin Yalsinia ya Tarcallo, ihres Zeichens Leiterin der jüngst gegründeten Aves-Schule der Herzog-Eolan-Universität zu Methumis, bringen sie immer näher an das Geheimnis althergebrachter Prophezeiungen, welche die drohende Gefahr vorhergesehen haben und den Schamanen der Waldmenschen Mittel an die Hand gegeben haben, ihr zu begegnen. Doch finstere Kräfte trachten danach, das Vorhaben der Schamanen zu vereiteln, und die durchtriebene al’anfanische Entdeckerin Notia Botero-Montez, die auch vor ordinärem Diebstahl nicht zurückschreckt, um ihre eigenen Forschungen voranzutreiben, ist im Vergleich dazu harmlos.

Wagemutige Entdecker sind dazu aufgerufen, das Mysterium der Jadestatuette zu lüften, welche aus dem Besitz der horasischen Gelehrten entwendet wurde. Es gilt, den Spuren einer längst vergessenen Kultur zu folgen. Von der Sonnenstadt Hôt-Alem aus müssen die Helden die Insel Altoum bereisen und sich den dort lebenden Waldmenschenstämmen annähern, sie müssen die unwegsamen Dschungel am Ufer des Flusses Jalob durchqueren und ins Hochland von H’Rabaal aufsteigen – und sich am Ende gar in die unerforschten Tiefen unter dem Regengebirge wagen. Dabei mag es ihnen gelingen, eines der bestgehüteten Geheimnisse der Dampfenden Dschungel zu ergründen: die vor Jahrtausenden verschollene, legendäre Stadt Kuruke-Wape.

boardgame.name: Glaube, Macht & Heldenmut: Das Dornenreich
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb

Whether proud Barbourine clan warrior or elegant Flaming Heron Balayan, whether mysterious Qabalothin or sociable Majuna magician dancer - the Thorn Empire has always produced its very own breed of heroes. It is of secondary importance whether a heroine walks the paths of the passionate Rahja, calls the mongoose shaped Lord Feqz for luck in business or magical power, or has perhaps even completely turned away from the gods ...
Armed with faith, power and heroism, your heroes can face the dangers of the Thorn Empire and get to the bottom of its many mysteries!

In this focus rule supplement, you will be introduced to talent, combat and magic styles, as well as matching Advanced Special Skills for the Profession Packs from the DSA5 regional game help Das Dornenreich.

In order to use these supplementary rules, you will need the DSA5 rulebook, the Aventurian Almanac as well as Das Dornenreich - Aranien und das Erbe des Moghulats.


Klappentext

Ob stolze Barburiner Sippenkriegerin oder elegante Flammenreiher-Balayan, ob geheimnistuerische Qabalothin oder geselliger Majuna-Zaubertänzer – das Dornenreich hat schon immer einen ganz eigenen Schlag an Helden hervorgebracht. Dabei ist zweitrangig, ob eine Heldin auf den Pfaden der leidenschaftlichen Rahja wandelt, den mungogestaltigen Herrn Feqz um Glück im Geschäft oder magische Macht anruft oder sich vielleicht gar völlig von den Göttern abgewandt hat …
Mit Glaube, Macht und Heldenmut ausgestattet können deine Helden sich den Gefahren des Dornenreichs stellen und seinen mannigfaltigen Mysterien auf den Grund gehen!

In dieser Fokusregelergänzung werden dir Talent-, Kampf- und Zauberstile sowie passende Erweiterte Sonderfertigkeiten für die Professionspakete aus der DSA5-Regionalspielhilfe Das Dornenreich vorgestellt.

Zur Nutzung dieser Ergänzungsregeln benötigst du das DSA5-Regelwerk, den Aventurischen Almanach sowie Das Dornenreich – Aranien und das Erbe des Moghulats.

boardgame.name: Transformation in Chaos
Wandel im Chaos
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb##For the Khunchomer it is Dar-Marustani, for most foreigners a completely strange and crazy world - but for its Marascan inhabitants the As'Tuzak district has become their home during the time of exile. Order was maintained here for many years by the Eastern Tetrarch Keïderan-Dajin and his guards. But the Tetrarch has died, and
Restlessness has gripped the quarter. Two candidates are courting and arguing about the succession of the opponent, and nobody can yet foresee how this conflict will end.

Of course, various groups of powers are also interested in the future of the Marascan community, and some may not be satisfied with the role of observer. Is someone up to no good here? How good that Rur creates a beautiful and perfect world
it means that the paths of the heroes lead to As'Tuzak just in this time. Here, in the maelstrom of events, they can make a trend-setting decision. To do so, however, they must first find out in the bubbling rumor mill of the quarter who really poses a threat to the Marascan community - not easy, if you might soon become part of the omnipresent Kladj yourself.

Keywords for the adventure: Maraskan quarter in times of upheaval, an imminent assassination attempt and a shady ally
Genre: Research and intrigue adventure
Requirements: helpfulness, flair, open-mindedness towards marascans
Place: Khunchom, Maraskan district
Time: Travia 1038 BF
complexity (player / master): medium to high / medium to high
Experience level of the heroes: experienced to competent

requirements:
Combat talents 3/4
Natural talents 1/4
Social talents 4/4
Living history 3/4


Klappentext

Für die Khunchomer ist es Dar-Marustani, für die meisten Auswärtigen eine völlig fremde und verrückte Welt – aber für seine maraskanischen Bewohnerinnen und Bewohner ist das Viertel As’Tuzak in der Zeit des Exils zu ihrer Heimat geworden. Die Ordnung hielten hier über viele Jahre der östliche Tetrarch Keïderan-Dajin und seine Wächter. Doch der Tetrarch ist verstorben, und
Unruhe hat das Viertel erfasst. Gleich zwei Kandidaten werben und streiten um die Nachfolge des Gegangenen, und noch kann niemand ahnen, wie dieser Konflikt ausgehen wird.

Natürlich interessieren sich auch verschiedene Mächtegruppen für die Zukunft der maraskanischen Gemeinschaft, und manche mag sich dabei nicht mit der Rolle des Beobachters zufriedengeben. Ob hier jemand Übles im Schilde führt? Wie gut, dass Rur die Welt schön und vollkommen erschaffen
hat, bedeutet es doch, dass die Wege der Helden just in dieser Zeit nach As’Tuzak führen. Hier können sie im Strudel der Ereignisse eine richtungsweisende Entscheidung treffen. Dafür müssen sie jedoch zunächst in der brodelnden Gerüchteküche des Viertels herausfinden, von wem wirklich eine Gefahr für die maraskanische Gemeinschaft ausgeht – nicht einfach, wenn man womöglich bald selbst Teil des allgegenwärtigen Kladjs wird.

Stichworte zum Abenteuer: Maraskanerviertel in Zeiten des Umbruchs, ein drohender Mordanschlag und ein zwielichtiger Verbündeter
Genre: Recherche- und Intrigenabenteuer
Voraussetzungen: Hilfsbereitschaft, Spürsinn, Aufgeschlossenheit gegenüber Maraskanern
Ort: Khunchom, Maraskanerviertel
Zeit: Travia 1038 BF
Komplexität (Spieler / Meister): mittel bis hoch / mittel bis hoch
Erfahrungsgrad der Helden: erfahren bis kompetent

Anforderungen:
Kampftalente 3/4
Naturtalente 1/4
Gesellschaftstalente 4/4
Lebendige Geschichte 3/4

boardgame.name: Im Namen der Schlange
boardgame.description:
PublisherÄs blurb

Maraskan. Beautiful and dangerous, fun-loving and quarrelsome - the dualism of being is nowhere as obvious as on the island of the changeable. But Maraskan is threatened by a unique disaster, and Kerime al'Kadim wants to be ready to confront it. With the As'Haima of the Madahajida, she possesses an encrypted map that will be important in the upcoming battle, but she has not yet succeeded in wresting this knowledge from the As'Haima. A Marascan expert could help, but refuses to come to Khunchom. So the cloth must be brought to him. But the content of the As'Haima is so explosive that not only the Draconians demand this knowledge. It will take daring and astute heroes to bring the woven riddle safely to Yerschoggyn and defend it against the minions of that dark force that seeks to gain the As'Haima itself. Something is stirring in the jungles of Maraskan and if the heroes fail, the
Battle for the fate of the island hardly to win.


Klappentext

Maraskan. Schön und gefährlich, lebenslustig und zerstritten – der Dualismus des Seins ist nirgends so augenscheinlich wie auf der Insel der Wandelbaren. Doch Maraskan droht ein einzigartiges Unheil und Kerime al’Kadim will bereit sein, um ihm entgegenzutreten. Mit dem As’Haima der Madahajida besitzt sie eine verschlüsselte Karte, die im bevorstehenden Kampf wichtig sein wird, nur gelang es bisher nicht, dem As’Haima dieses Wissen abzutrotzen. Ein maraskanischer Experte könnte Abhilfe schaffen, aber weigert sich, nach Khunchom zu kommen. So muss das Tuch zu ihm gebracht werden. Doch der Inhalt des As’Haimas ist so brisant, dass es nicht nur die Draconiter nach diesem Wissen verlangt. Es bedarf wagemutiger und scharfsinniger Helden, das gewebte Rätsel sicher nach Yerschoggyn zu bringen und gegen die Schergen jener dunklen Macht zu verteidigen, die danach trachtet, das As’Haima selbst zu erringen. Etwas regt sich in den Dschungeln Maraskans und wenn die Helden scheitern, ist der
Kampf um das Schicksal der Insel kaum noch zu gewinnen.

boardgame.name: Draftosaurus: Marina
Драфтозавры: водоплавающие
boardgame.description:
Draftosaurus: Marina expands the boundaries of your park and adds a new species to draft: plesiosauruses!

This expansion for Draftosaurus adds a new double-sided board that each player can combine with their existing park to add a new river zone. Plesiosauruses are the only dino-meeples that can be placed in this part of the river, granting points at the end of the game. To move your plesiosaurus further down the river and earn more points, you must place specific other species in your park to unlock the dams one by one!

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups

listing.notes:
Spieler: 2 - 5 Spieler Sprache: DE, EN, FR Spieldauer: 15 Minuten Alter: 8 +
Draftosaurus Marina Diese eleganten Wassersaurier werden eure Besucher begeistern, wenn sie durch die neue Wasserzone schwimmen, die den Fluss verlängert.
Mit dieser Erweiterung erhält euer Zoo eine neue Art: den Plesiosaurus. Dieser Wassersaurier lebt in der neuen Marina und mit ihm können viele Zusatzpunkte erzielt werden. Die Plesioaurier leben im Wasser in der Marina auf dem neuen Spielbrett.
Die Marina ist die Verlängerung des Flusses und nur die Plesiosaurier können sich im Fluss fortbewegen. Die Plesiosaurier sind Wassertiere weshalb sie nur über den Fluss in den Zoo einziehen können. Sobald ein Dino im Zoo platziert wird, der auf der Brücke vor dem Plesiosaurier abgebildet ist, kann der Plesiosaurier in den nächsten Flussabschnitt vorrücken.
Es dürfen aber gleichzeitig mehrere Plesiosaurier auf dem Fluss vorrücken wenn sie sich auf demselben Feld befinden. Am Ende bringt jede Plesiosaurier Siegpunkte entsprechend des Flussabschnitts, in dem er sich befindet.
Ein Grundspiel "Draftosaurus" wird zum Spielen benötigt.
Inhalt: • 5 Marinaplatten • 10 Plesiosaurier-Figuren • Spielregeln
Achtung! Nicht für Kinder unter 3 Jahren geeignet. Verschluckbare Kleinteile. Erstickungsgefahr!

boardgame.name: Draftosaurus: Aerial Show
Draftosaurus: Show Aéreo
Драфтозавры: летающие
boardgame.description:
Draftosaurus: Aerial Show expands the boundaries of your park and adds a new species to draft: pterodactyls!

This expansion for Draftosaurus adds a double-sided board that each player can combine with their existing park to add a new mountain zone. Pterodactyls are the only dino-meeples that can be placed on this part of the board, and each of their nests offers you a specific bonus in return, ranging from extra points to immunity to the placement die!

listing.notes:
Spieler: 2 - 5 Spieler Sprache: DE, EN, FR Spieldauer: 15 Minuten Alter: 8 +
Draftosaurus Aerial Show Eure Besucher werden über diese majestätischen Flugsaurier staunen wenn sie durch die neue eröffnete Gebirgszone spazieren! Mit dieser Erweiterung erhält euer Zoo eine neue Art: den Pterodaktylus. Dieser Flugsaurier lebt in den Bergen von wo er euch zahlreiche Boni und Vorteile ermöglicht. Die Pterodaktylen leben in Nestern in den Bergen die auf dem neuen Spielbrett zu finden sind. Nur die Pterodaktylen können dort hausen. Zusätzlich dürfen die Nester nur in der vorgegebenen Reihenfolge mit Pterodaktylen bevölkert werden. Im Gegenzug erhält der Spieler entweder Siegpunkte oder Zusätzliche Vorteile. Ein solcher Vorteil ist ein Ei aus dem ein Dinosaurier schlüpft. Die geschlüpften Dinos werden sofort im Zoo untergebracht. Ein anderer Vorteil kommt in Form von Zusatzpunkten für eine bestimmte Dino Art, die für jeden Spieler eine andere ist. Die Spielbretter unterscheiden sich voneinander. Oder der Effekt des Regelwürfels wird für den Rest des Spiels ausgeschaltet. Es lohnt sich, den Zoo mit diesen eleganten Geschöpfen zu erweitern!
Ein Grundspiel "Draftosaurus" wird zum Spielen benötigt.
Hinweis: Die Zooplatte der ersten Auflage ist etwas kleiner. Bei den späteren Auflagen wurde die Zooplatte etwas vergrössert. Die Erweiterung "Aerial Show" wurde auf die grössere Zooplatte der aktuellen Auflage zugeschnitten. Auch der Beutel wurde vergrössert. Das hat spielerisch jedoch keinerlei Einfluss.
Inhalt: • 5 doppelseitige Volierenplatten • 10 Pterodaktylus-Figuren • 1 Spielregeln
Achtung! Nicht für Kinder unter 3 Jahren geeignet. Verschluckbare Kleinteile. Erstickungsgefahr!

boardgame.name: Klimasvin
boardgame.description:
Klimasvin (Danish for "climate pig") is a game about limited resources. Players fill up the map with their pieces. Whoever has most luxury points at the end of the game wins - unless someone has been forced to place one of their pieces so it extends out of the map. In this case, the winner is the player who has the fewest luxury points at the end of the game.

—user summary

boardgame.name: Grand Austria Hotel: Alles Walzer!
Grand Austria Hotel: Let's Waltz!
boardgame.description: Grand Austria Hotel: Let's Waltz! is an expansion for Grand Austria Hotel that contains five modules.
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2021 Golden Geek Best Board Game Expansion Nominee

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
